page.title: 11Farms of Arden 1
page.content: The farms in the area are mostly sheep and beef cattle farms.There used to be many dairy farms but now there is only one.The crops are used to feed the animals.Two of the farms are run by farm managers. The remainder are leased from Luss and Arden Estates. Some of the smaller farms are being joined with others to make a single unit, others depend on extra income from Bed and Breakfast. At Wester Auchandennan there are Blackface ewes and cross lambs, suckler cows and calves. The crops are barley, rape, turnips and potatoes.Rossbank is a dairy farm. It has Freisian cows.Sheep are fed there in the winter.The crops are grass silage, barley and potatoes At Midross there are Swaledale ewes, Border Leicester rams and cross lambs, calves and store cattle.Barley, potatoes and turnips are grown.
